articles.description: Kerala now houses the champions of the Santosh Trophy, the I-League, the Indian Women's League and the finalists of the ISL.
articles.content: The Manjeri-Payyanad football stadium, in central Kerala, is like something straight out of a postcard. It's in the middle of nowhere - no shopping or residential areas for kilometers around the appr… [+8494 chars]

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Don't set bad precedents for Indian cricket. You come here for 2 months: Jadeja - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Making no attempts to hide his thoughts, Jadeja slammed the KKR team management and added that decisions like these can set 'bad precedents' for Indian cricket.
articles.content: Former India cricketer Ajay Jadeja was not at all pleased with Kolkata Knight Riders' decision to drop Venkatesh Iyer for their IPL 2022 match against the Rajasthan Royals at the Wankhede Stadium in … [+2316 chars]

articles.title: IPL 2022, GT vs PBKS | Twitter reacts to Jonty Rhodes jumping in joy after Rahul Tewatia’s wicket - SportsCafe
articles.description: Oftentimes, support staff in dugouts leap in joy whenever bowlers provide breakthrough wickets, which can be game-changers in the later stage of the innings. Kagiso Rabada produced the crucial wicket of Rahul Tewatia on Tuesday, which resulted in witnessing a…
articles.content: GT had hope to finish things in style, with Rahul Tewatia still in the middle. But Kagiso Rabada, after coming to attack in the 17th over, shattered their dreams. He bowled a good length delivery ang… [+164 chars]
